name: Soul (Ormanus)
description:
Soul

Made at Assembly Summer 2019 Game Jam

The world has fallen under the armies of dead. All seems hopeless, when their leader, the Reaper, commands them and his minions roam the land in search for souls.

Some of them aren't stupid, though, and may be bribed to give you equipment to defeat the rest... for the price of some fragments of your soul. 

Code: Ormanus & RikusOrs

Graphics: Hannah_noon & Miigii

Music: Miigii
